ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 80
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes most definatly lanterns. Then scewers. I watched my brother sink 80 plat into his skill and start making banded at skill rank 80 in the space of 2 days.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes most definatly lanterns. Then scewers. I watched
my brother sink 80 plat into his skill and start
making banded at skill rank 80 in the space of 2 days.
And he even made very few studs, just went on into
steel boing because of the time factor. Of course he
does have a Wisdom of 100 and a Int of 105.

--- Phil Crosland <phil@...> wrote:
> I'd recommend lanterns till 65 or so. They are
> easier to make and sell well back to the merchants
> while skewers at 40 will be 95% failures. Lanterns
> are a bit of a pain to make but at least you
> make something you can sell back or even sell or
> give to newbies
>
> Andric d'Regor
> Karana
>
> <snip>
> I just made 40 in smithing. I tried to research
> what to do next, but I am finding conficting
> information. Should I be making lanterns or skewers
> now? Or should I be making something else?
>
